item.title: Giving Back: My Volunteer Experience with BackPack Beginnings
item.description:
ü§ù Community service has always been close to my heart, and I‚Äôm proud to share that I recently completed 18 hours of volunteer work with BackPack Beginnings ‚Äî a nonprofit organization based in Greensboro, NC.

During my time there, I assisted with various tasks that support their mission: connecting children and families to essential resources like food and basic necessities. The team described my work as efficient, considerate, and positive ‚Äî a reflection of the values I strive to bring to every environment I‚Äôm part of.
